version_description:
Toonia Colorbook now works perfectly on iPad Pro <3 This update also includes some bug fixes and performance improvements.

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook. If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!

Toonia Colorbook now works perfectly on iPad Pro <3
A small gift is coming up soon for all Toonia Colorbook users!

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook.
If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!

We've included a small gift for both our loyal and future users. Thank you for coloring, we hope you enjoy it!

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook.
If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!

We've included a small gift for both our loyal and future users. Thank you for coloring, we hope you enjoy it!

We've also fixed a few bugs; the rainbow brush now works in hard mode as well, we'll let you play your own music, and you can turn off the Shake to Erase gesture in Settings.
Find more settings by tapping the Toonia logo on the home screen!

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook.
If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!

We've included a small gift for both our loyal and future users. Thank you for coloring, we hope you enjoy it!

A few bugs have been ironed out, and we've significantly reduced the app size.

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook.
If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

Have you noticed a cute cat finding its way into the app?
His name is Cozy the Port-a-Cat. Cozy is the mascot of the American Childhood Cancer Organization, one of America's largest grassroots non-profit organizations at the front lines of the fight against childhood cancer. They are dedicated to providing critical support, education and comfort to families faced with this difficult journey. Including Cozy in Toonia's Colorbook is our way of showing support and appreciation of their work.

Big THANKS for using Toonia Colorbook.
If you have any questions or suggestions please reach out to feedback@toonia.com. Happy coloring!
